author: Linda Givetash and Matteo Moschella and Leou Chen and Matthew Mulligan and Eric Baculinao and Ali Gostanian and Mohammed Syed and Caroline Radnofsky
title: China accused of discriminating against Africans as part of coronavirus fight
description: Ambassadors to Beijing and others say Africans have been harassed, denied basic services and even evicted despite adhering to mitigation guidelines.
content:
Chinese officials are denying allegations that people of color are facing discrimination and even eviction under coronavirus mitigation efforts, as they report that Africans are among the countrys newly confirmed cases.
The Chinese state news agency, Xinhua,… [+5160 chars]
